jcurses.widgets
类 Panel

java.lang.Object
  jcurses.widgets.Widget
      jcurses.widgets.WidgetContainer
          jcurses.widgets.Panel
直接已知子类：
BorderPanel
public class Panel
extends WidgetContainer

This class implements a panel container for widgets. A panel is a rectangle with a specified color to place on it other widgets. Each window has a panel called root panel that serves as root for the widget hierarchy.

构造方法详细信息

Panel

public Panel()

Panel

public Panel(int width,
             int height)
The constructor

参数：
width - preferred width, if -1 is passed , no width is preferred, so the width of the panel depends only on the layout manager of the parent container or on the window width, if this is a root panel.
height - preferred height, if -1 is passed , no height is preferred, so the width of the panel depends only on the layout manager of the parent container or on the window width, if this is a root panel.
height -
方法详细信息

getPreferredSize

protected Rectangle getPreferredSize()
从类 Widget 复制的描述
This method gives the widget container the infomation about the preferred size of this widget. Must be implemented by derived classes.

指定者：
类 Widget 中的 getPreferredSize

paintSelf

protected void paintSelf()
从类 WidgetContainer 复制的描述
The method paits the container self, that is all except childrens. Is called by doPaint. Must be overrided by derived classes.

指定者：
类 WidgetContainer 中的 paintSelf

repaintSelf

protected void repaintSelf()
从类 WidgetContainer 复制的描述
The method repaints the container self, that is all, except childrens. Is called by doRepaint. Must be overrided by derived classes.

指定者：
类 WidgetContainer 中的 repaintSelf

public CharColor getPanelColors()

panel colors

public void setPanelColors(CharColor colors)
